title: Passage of 26th constitutional amendment to open way of success, prosperity and development in country: Faisal Vawda
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 20 (APP): Senator Faisal Vawda has expressed that the incumbent government had achieved a major task and now the ways of success, prosperity and development would be opened in the country.
Talking to the media persons outside of the Parliament House here Sunday, he criticized the behavior of PTI adding the immature political vision of some peoples could not lead the politics of the country.
He said that with the passage of time, other constitutional amendment would be introduce in the future for the sake of the country.
Senator Faisal said the Upper House of the Parliament had passed 26th constitutional amendments with two-third simple majority.
He expressed that this was not the last amendment, more amendments would be introduce in the future with the aim that
no risk no gain and the political dwarfs could not be succeed in their aims.
He said that tonight, the government would celebrate this big achievement.
